about_the_game:
Jennifer is a beautiful and innocent young girl who has lived her whole life in a small town named Greensdale, but her dream has always been to live in the big city.

After her sister Jessica and her boyfriend Mike said goodbye to her at the bus station, she headed towards the city.


Jennifer's fate is now in your hands. Will you help her make the "best" decisions for her future? Will she remain an innocent, hard-working young woman? Or will you lead her down a path of unprecedented corruption and debauchery?


Step into an exciting story full of places to discover, people to meet, and find out, with your "help", what the future holds for Jennifer... will she choose innocence... or money?



What can you expect from this erotic visual novel for adults?
Besides an intriguing story, interesting characters, and lots of sex, some of the main features are:

Interactive system for erotic scenes. You are able to:



(1) Select any camera to view the scene.
(2) Switch between 3 levels of scene speed, slow, medium, and fast.
(3) Scene volume, all hot scenes have sounds!

Music player integrated into the game, select the song you like, volume, etc.

Available in 30 languages!!!

4K/60fps quality animations and Full HD images





The time has come for Jennifer to start her new life in the city. What will her future be?


* The base version of the game on Steam is free, and contains the first 3 episodes of the first season. The full season consists of 8 episodes and has already been developed, it will be added as downloadable content (DLC) for those who want to purchase it and support the project here on Steam.

** The second season is already in development.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game includes sex between consenting adult characters, topics such as corruption, cheating, blackmailing and use of drugs and violence.

The main plot is based on the corruption of the female main protagonist.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11 or Superior
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

name: Innocence Or Money Season 1 - Episodes 1 to 3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Superior
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Get ready to take control of Jennifer's life! In this Erotic Visual Novel for Adults, you will decide the future of the innocent protagonist. Will you keep her being sweet and innocent? Or will you lead her down a path of corruption and self destruction? Her future is in your hands...
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian, Estonian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Slovak, Slovenian
